amendatorysection.catchline: Permit to hunt deer, antelope, or elk; issued to disabled person; limitation.
amendatorysection.para: A permit issued to a disabled person to hunt deer, antelope, or elk shall not have a limitation regarding the sex of such animal unless, for management purposes, the commission determines that all permits issued in the management unit in which the application for a permit is made shall have a limitation regarding the sex of the animal.
